title: We Robot
description: Created in 2017, local association of robotic for youth, based in Gaillon, France. We participate to international and national competitions, winner of First Global Contest in Washington DC in 2017 and of World Adolescent Robotic Contest in Guyiang, China in 2018.

edito.title: Edito
edito.content:
The 2022-2023 season has once again been a great success for the Saturday morning digital workshop. Six teenagers have been very dedicated, and we have shared wonderful moments. The intervention at the Jardins de bas neighborhood house unfolded in a mixed manner due to numerous interruptions. In fact, it has been suspended this year, and we are waiting for the stabilization of its opening and planning to modify the intervention format. We prepared for the Junior Robotics French Cup, but the regional competition was canceled at the last minute, so we couldn't compete against others.

For this 2023-2024 school year, we are resuming with more or less the same ingredients:

  • The Saturday digital workshop
  • Robotics competitions:
  • The FIRST Global Challenge in Singapore in early October 2023
  • The FIRST Tech Challenge in Lyon in early April 2024
  • Continuing free membership for high school students interested in communication
Furthermore, starting December 2, 2023, we are changing locations and you can find us on Avenue du Printemps de Prague in Gaillon.

You can contact us via our form and to join, you can do it directly online here.

mission.title: Our goal
mission.content:
Our main purpose is the playful education of teenagers in the fields of STEAM.
We have teams of motivated students participate in national and internation robotic competitions.
At the same time, we propose an initiation into robotics for children from 8 to 12 years old.

support.title: Support us
support.content:
Robotics is an expensive activity. It requires a lot of hardware (engines, sensors, mechanical elements, electronic boards, tools, nuts and bolts, computer ...).
Moreover, travel, especially internationally, is not within everyone's reach.
That's why we are always looking for partners and financial support.
